Posts.EditableText:
im making a big rpg in quest and have found a bug.

i currently have 26 rooms and 26 items(not 1 per room).

when i compleate a room or make an item do something,i check it works properly. to save time i saved it as i went along and called it bug check.

just now i encoutered an error when trying to load this file saying:

[quote:1k07crt2]run-time error '28':

Out of Stack space[/quote:1k07crt2]

what does this mean?

Posts.EditableText: Could be a problem with { braces } in the file. If you could email it to me I'll take a look into it.
